name: cloudflare-devtools
description: Manage Cloudflare's Development Mode and Cache within VS Code.

cloudflareDevTools.api.key.markdownDescription:
Generated on the [My Account](https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens) page.  
 - *Permissions*: 
    - `Zone > Zone Settings > Edit` 
    - `Zone > Zone > Edit`  
 - *Zone Resources*: 
    - `Include > Specific zone > your_domain`

cloudflareDevTools.api.email.description: Email address associated with your account.

cloudflareDevTools.api.zoneID.description: Found in the Overview of your domain in your Cloudflare account.

cloudflareDevTools.cache.purgeAutomatica.markdownDescription: Purge Cloudflare's cache automatically after turning on `Development Mode`

cloudflareDevTools.developmentModeStatus.markdownDescription:
Sends periodic requests to the API to check whether `Development Mode` is `On` or `Off`.  
 *(Recommended - will update the cloud icon's appearance in the status bar depending on Dev. Mode's status)*.

How often *(in seconds)* to ping the API, to check whether `Development Mode` is On or Off.  
 `#cloudflareDevTools.developmentModeStatus.enable#` needs to be `true`.
